name: QA audit
brief: Conduct a full QA audit of all five shipped projects (landing page, PDF Splitter, PDF Combiner, OST Tool, Task History) covering happy paths, edge cases, responsive behavior, keyboard navigation, accessibility, and error states. Produce a findings report with severity ratings.
kickoffPrompt:
You have a new project to work on.

## Project: QA audit

**Brief:**
Conduct a full QA audit of all five shipped projects (landing page, PDF Splitter, PDF Combiner, OST Tool, Task History) covering happy paths, edge cases, responsive behavior, keyboard navigation, accessibility, and error states. Produce a findings report with severity ratings.

## Instructions

Hand this project to Thomas (PM) to scope and manage. He will decide who to involve and in what order. Follow CLAUDE.md and the agent definitions for workflow and team details.
